component.name: listComments
component.description: List comments of specific post of a specific blog

component.name: getComment
component.description: get a specific comment of specific post of a specific blog

component.name: approveComment
component.description: approve a specific comment of specific post of a specific blog, as not spam

component.name: deleteComment
component.description: delete a specific comment of specific post of a specific blog

component.name: listCommentsByBlog
component.description: list comments of a specific blog

component.name: removeCommentContent
component.description: removes content of a comment as spam
